ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Participant is dead:
Date of death
Date of death provided is:
Notes: 1= Exact; 2= To nearest month; 3= To nearest year; 4= Within 5 years; 5= Within 5+ years

ElementDescription: PI determined manner of death:
Notes: 1= Natural; 2= Suicide; 3= Accident; 4= Homicide; 5= Pending; 6= Could not determine; 7= Suspected Suicide

ElementDescription: Comments on PI Determination of Death
Original manner of death (if disputed):
Notes: 1= Natural; 2= Suicide; 3= Accident; 4= Homicide; 5= Pending; 6= Could not determine; 7= Suspected Suicide

ElementDescription: Comments on Original Manner of Death
Primary/Immediate general cause of death
Notes: 1= Cardiac; 2= B-Stroke; 3= Infection/Pneumonia; 4= Cancer; 5= Diabetes; 6= Renal Failure; 7= Respiratory Failure; 8= Dementia; 9= Unknown; 10= Other

ElementDescription: If other, explain Primary General Cause of Death:
Primary/Immediate Specific cause of death:
Comments on Primary Specific cause of death
Other general cause(s) of death: Cardiac
Other general cause(s) of death: Stroke
Other general cause(s) of death: Infection/Pneumonia
Other general cause(s) of death: Cancer
Other general cause(s) of death: Diabetes
Other general cause(s) of death: Renal Failure
Other general cause(s) of death: Respiratory Failure
Other general cause(s) of death: Dementia
Other general cause(s) of death: Unknown
Other general cause(s) of death: Other
If other General Cause of Death, explain:
Other specific cause of death #1
Other specific cause of death #2
Other specific cause of death #3
Other specific cause of death #4
Comments on other specific causes of death
Source of death Info:
Source of death info if other:
Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
